channel.title: The Trading Glitch Alot of servers have
channel.description: how do i fix it? The Glitch its self is inwhich if a server disconnects a player or the server its self reboots. and anyone who was trading loses the items. is there a way to avoid this? or if one of theplayers in a trade is disconnected, no matter what even if the still online player declines the trade. any items that he put up in the trade disappears the next time he trades.

item.title: The Trading Glitch Alot of servers have

item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

hmmm…OOH i think i know what you mean. TY delta you are very helpful.
